languages.text: Вольный Торговец путешествует между системами через интерфейс глобальной карты {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Первым делом Навигатор сканирует варп вокруг системы в поисках других систем и простраивает до них маршруты, если это возможно. За сканирование вы получаете {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}интуицию Навигатора{/g}, которую можете потратить на строительство новых маршрутов или снижение опасности существующих. Также вы можете получить дополнительную интуицию Навигатора за события, происходящие в варпе.

Travel between systems takes place on the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} map. First, the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g} by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец путешествует между системами через интерфейс глобальной карты {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Первым делом Навигатор сканирует варп вокруг системы в поисках других систем и простраивает до них маршруты, если это возможно. За сканирование вы получаете {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}интуицию Навигатора{/g}, которую можете потратить на строительство новых маршрутов или снижение опасности существующих. Также вы можете получить дополнительную интуицию Навигатора за события, происходящие в варпе.

traits.locale_text: Travel between systems take place on the Koronus Expanse map. First the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive Navigator's insight by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.

Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. Travel between systems takes place on the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} map. First, the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g} by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.

languages.text: Das Reisen zwischen verschiedenen Systemen wird über die Karte der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gesteuert. Zunächst inspiziert der Navigator des Schiffs den Warp um das aktuelle System herum und sucht dabei nach anderen Systemen und möglichen Routen. Dabei verdienst du Einsicht des Navigators, eine Ressource, die für das Festlegen neuer Routen oder das Verringern der Gefahrenstufe bereits existierender Routen verwendet werden kann. Du kannst außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Einsicht des Navigators{/g} durch das Abwickeln bestimmter im Warp auftretender Ereignisse erhalten.
languages.original_text: Travel between systems takes place on the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} map. First, the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g} by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.

traits.locale_text: Das Reisen zwischen verschiedenen Systemen wird über die Karte der Koronus-Ausdehnung gesteuert. Zunächst inspiziert der Navigator des Schiffs den Warp um das aktuelle System herum und sucht dabei nach anderen Systemen und möglichen Routen. Dabei verdienst du {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}Einsicht{/g} des Navigators, eine Ressource, die für das Festlegen neuer Routen oder das Verringern der Gefahrenstufe bereits existierender Routen verwendet werden kann. Du kannst außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Einsicht des Navigators{/g} durch das Abwickeln bestimmter im Warp auftretender Ereignisse erhalten.

languages.text: Les déplacements entre systèmes s'effectuent sur la carte des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Dans un premier temps, le navigateur du vaisseau sonde le Warp autour du système actuel à la recherche d'autres systèmes et d'itinéraires possibles pour s'y rendre. Ce faisant, vous bénéficiez des effets de Perspicacité du navigateur, une ressource permettant de tracer de nouveaux itinéraires ou de réduire le niveau de dangerosité des itinéraires existants. Vous pouvez également bénéficier de {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Perspicacité du navigateur{/g} en résolvant certains événements qui se produisent dans le Warp.
languages.original_text: Travel between systems takes place on the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} map. First, the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g} by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.

traits.locale_text: Les déplacements entre systèmes s'effectuent sur la carte des Étendues de Koronus. Dans un premier temps, le Navigateur du vaisseau sonde le Warp autour du système actuel à la recherche d'autres systèmes et d'itinéraires possibles pour s'y rendre. Ce faisant, vous bénéficiez des effets de {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}Perspicacité{/g} du Navigateur, une ressource permettant de tracer de nouveaux itinéraires ou de réduire le niveau de dangerosité des itinéraires existants. Vous pouvez également bénéficier de {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Perspicacité du Navigateur{/g} en résolvant certains événements qui se produisent dans le Warp.

languages.text: 您可以通过{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的地图，在不同星系之间旅行。首先，舰船上的导航者会对当前星系的亚空间进行调查，寻找目标星系以及通往该星系的航线。调查星系会使导航者获得洞察，这种资源可以用来绘制新航线，或降低已有航线的危险级别。您还可以通过解决某些特定的亚空间事件，来提高{g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}导航者洞察{/g}。
languages.original_text: Travel between systems takes place on the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} map. First, the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g} by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.

traits.locale_text: 您可以通过科罗努斯扩区的地图，在不同星系之间旅行。首先，舰船上的导航者会对当前星系的亚空间进行调查，寻找目标星系以及通往该星系的航线。调查星系会使导航者获得{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}洞察{/g}，这种资源可以用来绘制新航线，或降低已有航线的危险级别。您还可以通过解决某些特定的亚空间事件，来提高{g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}导航者洞察{/g}。

languages.text: 星系間の移動は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}のマップ上で行われる。まず、船の航宙士が他の星系およびそこまでのルートを探すため、現在の星系の周囲の<歪み>を調査する。それにより航宙士の洞察力を獲得する。これを消費して新たなルートの作図や現行ルートの危険度を下げたりすることができる。また{g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}航宙士の洞察力{/g}は<歪み>で発生するイベントを解決することでも獲得できる。
languages.original_text: Travel between systems takes place on the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} map. First, the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g} by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.

traits.locale_text: 星系間の移動はコロヌス・エクスパンスのマップ上で行われる。まず、船の航宙士が他の星系およびそこまでのルートを探すため、現在の星系の周囲の<歪み>を調査する。<歪み>の調査により航宙士は{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}洞察力{/g}を獲得できる。これを消費することで新たなルートの作図ができるほか、現行ルートの危険度を低下させることができる。また、{g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}航宙士の洞察力{/g}は<歪み>で発生するイベントをクリアすることでも獲得できる。

languages.text: En el mapa de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} tiene lugar el viaje disforme. Para empezar, el Navegante de la nave evalúa la disformidad de alrededor del sistema actual para encontrar otros sistemas y posibles rutas hasta ellos. Tras ello, recibirás intuición de Navegante, un recurso que se puede invertir en trazar nuevas rutas o reducir el nivel de peligro de las ya existentes. También se obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}intuición de Navegante{/g} al resolver ciertos eventos que se dan en la disformidad.
languages.original_text: Travel between systems takes place on the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} map. First, the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g} by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.

traits.locale_text: En el mapa de la Extensión de Koronus tiene lugar el viaje disforme. Para empezar, el Navegante de la nave evalúa la disformidad de alrededor del sistema actual para encontrar otros sistemas y posibles rutas hasta ellos. Tras ello, recibirás {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}intuición{/g} de Navegante, un recurso que se puede invertir en trazar nuevas rutas o reducir el nivel de peligro de las ya existentes. También se obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}intuición de Navegante{/g} al resolver ciertos eventos que se dan en la disformidad.

languages.text: Sistemler arasında yolculuk, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g} haritasında gerçekleşir. İlk olarak geminin Rotacı'sı, diğer sistemleri ve onlara giden olası rotaları araştırmak için mevcut sistemin etrafındaki öteboyutu inceler. Bunu yapmak sana, yeni rotalar çizmekte veya mevcut rotaların tehlike düzeyini düşürmekte kullanabileceğin Rotacı içgörüsü kazandırır. Ayrıca öteboyutta meydana gelen belirli bazı olayları çözerek de {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Rotacı içgörüsü{/g} kazanabilirsin.
languages.original_text: Travel between systems takes place on the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} map. First, the ship's Navigator surveys the warp around the current system in search of other systems and possible routes leading to them. Doing so earns you Navigator's insight, a resource that can be spent on charting new routes or lowering the danger level of existing ones. You can also receive {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g} by resolving certain events that occur in the warp.
